DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether TVT-Secur ( TVT-S ) ( Hammock method ) TVT-Obturator ( TVT-O ) suburethral sling procedure equivalent patient satisfaction clinical efficacy treatment stress urinary incontinence alone stress component mixed urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: TVT-Secur Versus TVT-Obturator : A Randomized Trial Suburethral Sling Operative Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: Patient satisfaction measure symptom quality life questionnaire ( pre-operatively , 3 month one year ) patient pain measure verbal analogue rating scale ( post-operative day 1 day 7 ) . Clinical efficacy measure cough stress test pre-operatively post-operatively 3 month 1 year . A Q-tip test also perform pre-operatively 3 month 1 year post-operatively . Subjects follow minimum one year evaluate recurrence symptom complication , include rate mesh erosion , time normal void post-operative period , rate sling revision , post-operative pain , void dysfunction de novo urgency .
DOC.criteria: Are least 18 year age Demonstrate positive cough stress test complex multichannel urodynamic test Demonstrate impact stress urinary incontinence quality life questionnaire Are able comprehend sign write informed consent Understand willing comply study requirement , include agree available followup evaluation Are psychologically stable suitable intervention determine investigator Are ambulatory able use toilet independently Patients : Who pregnant plan become pregnant study future With elevated postvoid residual ( define PVR > 100cc ) With bleed condition anticoagulant therapy With immunosuppression ( i.e . HIV , lymphoma ) With multiple sclerosis progressive neurological disease With evidence local systemic infection , include urinary tract infection With evidence intrinsic sphincter deficiency define maximal urethral closure pressure < 20 cm H2O Previous suburethral sling Predominant overactive bladder symptom
